text: A provocative thought from @nytimes chief exec and president Mark Thompson at #OMCippr today. Not a complete fan of how social media giants operate....
author: DavidWastell

text:
OXFORD MEDIA CONVENTION
On way to hear newsmaking figures speak @IPPR  #OMCIPPR including @nytimes  Thompson, Sir David Clementi (BBC Chair) & digital minister @margot_james_mp

Looking forward to seeng lots of reporters too... Still time to come!
author: DavidWastell
